[#modal-slope_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-plot-soil-description-protocol-shapes:modal-slope:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils modal slopes codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils modal slopes codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/1166f6bb-c689-59a5-aa2e-c8e03c649f4b[`Gently inclined (3-10%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/0ba7ceea-2487-58cb-b89a-89552df2c64d[`Level (<1%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/5fe6626c-bd22-5757-bc9f-5fa68ae366ae[`Moderately inclined (10-32%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/84bcd77e-7687-526d-88aa-22803bf20992[`Precipitous (>100%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/24332608-69ab-588a-8e00-19b11fea8fe7[`Steep (32-56%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/eeac6119-55e3-54e1-8942-fe80eba250ef[`Very gently inclined (1-3%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/1bd2402c-0981-54ea-b308-db3fe3e3f28c[`Very steep (56-100%)`] 


|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
